message: Guys, for 7 years old child Xbox one or Wii ?  please advice if u can tell the prices i would appreciate it.

data.message: حمادة عامل ايه يا برنس ، وين أراضيك دلوقتي :) ، بص يا معلم أنا عندي xbox 360 والكنكت ممتاز جدا جدا للاطفال عندي بنتي ٥ سنين وبتتعامل وبتحبه وهو في ألعاب حلوة قوي للاطفال الصغيريين وللكنكت بالذات
For 7 years old, I would advise to let the kid play some football with his friends instead.
Thank you Guys, its a birthday gift, and will be useful for 2 kids.
can u tell me why you prefer and option to another ?
the good thing in Xbox that will not require any special tool. just you can use your hand also will be useful for kids and dad as well :) HBD...
I have a Wii ... It is super simple to use ... I use it to play with my dad, my young neice use it, kids in my family love it ...

I have no experience with consoles, and thankfully others have chimed in with useful info. I just want to stress the point of physical activity.

IMHO, It is good for kids of young age to interact with modern technology, and in my experience it helps bring up their talents, but physical activity is of utmost importance. Child obesity and withdrawal from human interaction are very possible and very dangerous issues.
xbox360 with kinect and I can provide some games for less prices
Don't get Wii at this stage there will be no new titles/games for Nintendo not a good invest for future, Xbox 360 will be a bit old, Xbox one supports new games  and older games 360 games
I have a Wii, but if you get the old version (like me), it will not get any new games. I suggest Xbox with kinect, much better and has more games (especially ones that make them move more than Wi)
It seems that Xbox + Kinect is better, Any idea about the price? And if it's better to get it from Egypt or not ?

When my father got me a wii few years ago, it was for about 3,000 egp. Today, you won't find new ones (speaking about the Xbox 360, not the new One), but they should be around 2,000. A quick search on dubizzle got me one ad of a modded Xbox 360 with 2 controllers and a 300GB hard disk of games and 13 CDs for 1,700. If the ad is true, I find this a good deal.

http://egypt.dubizzle.com/listing/7-listings-85d504e3f7c95f6aad3ac5e118e17488/
And if you are going to get it from outside Egypt, then get the new One (but personally, I don't think the differences between both versions are worth)
